title: Art Or Heist? A Danish Artist Took $84000 And Sent A Museum 2 Blank Canvases
content:
1. Art Or Heist? A Danish Artist Took $84000 And Sent A Museum 2 Blank Canvases  NPR
  2. A museum says they gave an artist $84,000 in cash to use in artwork. He delivered blank canvases and titled them "Take the Money and Run."  CBS News
  3. Museum pays artist $84K — he delivers 2 blank canvases titled 'Take the Money and Run'  New York Post
  4. Danish artist sends blank canvasses to museum for $84,000, says its art  Geo News
  5. Danish artist accepts $84,000 commission, unveils blank canvases titled "Take The Money And Run"  The A.V. Club
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

Museum pays artist $84K — he delivers 2 blank canvases titled 'Take the Money and Run'  New York Post
